div.p: nihan kaliṅaniṅ oṁ ah huṁ, yan pinakapaṅadhiṣṭhāna umajarakan an bhaṭāra tryakṣara sira paramārtha kāyavākcittavajra ṅaranira.

lg.l: ehi vatsa mahāyānaṁ mantracaryānayaṁ mantravāryanayaṁ mantracāryanayaṁ vidhiṁ
deśayiṣyāmi te samyak bhājanas tvaṁ mahānaye ||1||

div.p:
ka: saṅ hyaṅ mahāyāna iki varahakna mami iri kita, mantracaryānayaṁ vidhiṁ, saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya sira mahāyāna mahāmārga ṅaranira, deśayiṣyāmi te
samyak, sira teki deśanākna mami varahakna mami ri kita, bhājanas tvaṁ mahānaye, ri kadadinyan kita pātrabhūta yogya varahən ri saṅ hyaṅ dharma mantranaya.

lg.l: atītā ye hi sambuddhāḥ tathā caivāpy anāgatāḥ
pratyutpannāś ca ye nāthāḥ tiṣṭhanti ca jagaddhitāḥ ||2||

div.p:
ka: bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha saṅ atīta, saṅsa maṅabhisaṁbuddha ṅūni riṅ āsītkāla, kady aṅgān: bhaṭāra vipaśyī, viśvabhū, krakucchanda, kanakamuni, kāśyapa, atītabuddha, ṅaranira kabeh. tathā caivāpy anāgatāḥ, kunaṅ bhaṭāra buddha saṅ anāgata, saṅ abhimukha maṅabhisaṁbuddha, kady aṅgān: bhaṭāra āryamaitreyādi, samantabhadraparyantasamantai bhadra paryyanta, anāgatabuddha ṅaranira kabeh
pratyutpannāś ca ye nāthāḥ, tumamvah bhaṭāra śrī śākyamuni, vartamānabuddha ṅaranira, sira ta pinakahyaṅ buddhanta maṅke, śāsananira ikeṅ tinūt atinta. tiṣṭhanti ca jagaddhitāḥ, tamolah ta sira kumiṅkiṅ hitasukhaniṅ sarvasattva, umaṅənaṅəna kaləpasanikaṅ rāt kabeh saka riṅ saṅsāra, duvəg kumirakira paḍamaniṅ mahāpralaya rike bhuvana.

lg.l: taiś ca sarvair imaṁ vajraṁ jñātvā mantravidhim paraṁ
prāptā sarvajñatā vīraiḥ bodhimūle hy alakṣaṇāalakṣaṇa ||3||

div.p:
ka: sira katiga bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha ṅaranira, saṅ atītānāgatavartamāna, tan hana mārganira vaneh ar tinambakan ikaṅ kahyaṅbuddhan. jñātvā mantravidhim paraṁ, ikiṅ >mahāyānamahāyana mahāmārga ya tinūtakənira, pinakamārganira ar ḍataṅ rikana nirvāṇanagaranibāṇanagara.
prāptā sarvajñatā vīraiḥ bodhimūle hy alakṣaṇā, inakni deniradeniemend denirar or keep deni? guməgə̄ ikaṅ mantranayamantrānaya, ya ta mataṅ yar təmvakan kasarvajñān, ya ta hetunirār paṅguhakan ikaṅ kahyaṅbuddhān riṅ bodhimūla.

lg.l: mantraprayogam atulaṁ yena bhagnaṁ mahābalaṁ
mārasainyam mahāghoraṁ śākyasiṅhena tāyinā ||4||

div.p: ka: bhaṭāra śrī śākyamuni mataṅ yar təmvakan ikaṅ kamāravijayan, sakvehnikanaṅ māravighna alah denira: kleśamāra, skandhamāra, mr̥tyumāra, devaputramāra, alah aluyukaṅuyukSee , s.v. uyuk. ikā kabeh de bhaṭāra hetunirār vənaṅ umalahakən ikaṅ māra, ābhānubhāva prabhāva saṅ hyaṅ samādhi śakti saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya inabhyāsa.

lg.l: tasmān matim imāṁ vatsavartavārttāṁ kuru sarvajñatāptaye
śr̥ṇu bhadrāśayaṁgr̥ṇa bhadrāśayaṁśr̥ṇu bhadrāśayan nityaṁ samyak saṁhr̥tya kalpanāḥ ||5||

div.p: ka: mataṅyan deyanta kuru sarvajñātāptaye, hayva tālaṅalaṅ aṅənaṅənta rike saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya, pahapagəh denta guməgə̄ saṅ hyaṅ mantranayamantrānaya, mataṅ yan kapaṅguha ikaṅ kasarvajñatānkasarbvatān denta; śr̥ṇu bhadrāśayaṁgr̥ṇabhadrāśayan nityaṁ, pahavās denta ruməṅə̄ iki varavarah mami ri kita, hayva tanvān yatna vuvus mami. samyak saṅhr̥tya kalpanāḥ, karyakanem. kāryakən? karyakən? taṅ buddhi savikalpaka, hilaṅakanNormalize hilaṅakən? Thus , s.v. abhiniveśa. taṅ ambək abhiniveśa, pahenak tāṅənaṅənta, hayva saṅśaya.

lg.l: eṣa mārgavaraḥ śrīmān mahāyānamahodayaḥ
yena yūyaṁ gamiṣyanto bhaviṣyatha tathāgatāḥ ||6||

div.p:
ka: saṅ hyaṅ mahāyāna mahāmārga iki pintonakna mami ri kita, pahavās denta maṅrəṅə̄, mahāyānamahodayaḥ,
yeki havanavan abənər təka ri svargāpavarga, vənaṅ umehakənumehakənn ikaṅ kamahodayān. mahodaya, ṅa, ikaṅ bāhyādhyātmikasukha, vāhyasukha, ṅa, ikaṅ kaśreṣṭhyan, kasugihan, kapaməgətan, karatun, kacakravartin. ādhyātmikasukha, ṅa, ikeṅ lokottarasukha inak tan pavor duhkha, ajarāmaraṇa, tan katəkan tuha lara pati, nāṅ anuttara vara samyaksaṁbodhisukha, ikaṅ mokṣasukha, ikā taṅ bāhyasukha mvaṅ ādhyātmikasukha, ya ikā kamahodayan ṅa, anuṅ dinadyakəndinadyakənn ikeṅ mahāyāna mahāmārga, yan inabhyāsa. yena yūyaṁ gamiṣyanto, apan ri səḍaṅnyan apagəha denta guməgə̄ ikeṅ kamahāyānan; bhaviṣyatha tathā
gatāḥ, niyata kita tumamvaknaṅ kahyaṅbuddhān. sumākṣātkr̥ta ikaṅ kaləpasən, ikanaṅikā naṅ dvayasambhāra, nāṅ jñānasambhāra, puṇyasambhāra kapaṅguha ikā denta. lāvanlāvann ikaṅ kasarvalokanamaskr̥ta kopalambha ikā denta.

lg.l: svayambhuvo mahābhāgāḥ sarvalokasya cetiyāḥyetiyāḥyajñiyāḥye priyāḥ
astināstivyatikrāntaṁ ākāśam iva nirmalam ||7||

div.p: ka: kady aṅgāniṅ ākāśa anirmalasvabhāvaannirmmala svabhāva, alakṣaṇa, avastuka, tan kavənaṅ tinuduh, tan agə̄ṅ, tan aḍəmit, tan hirəṅ, tan putih, vyāpaka lumrā riṅ daśadeśa, maṅkana lvirnira.

lg.l: gambhīraṁ sarvatarkebhiratigambhīram apy atarkyam anāvilaṁ
sarvaprapañcarahitaṁ prapañcebhiḥ prapañcitaṁ ||8||

div.p:
ka: noravora mahāgambhīra lena saṅka rike saṅ hyaṅ mahāyāna mahāmārga sireki gambhīrātigambhīra:
adaləm sakeṅ adaləm; apy atarkyaṁ: tan kavənaṅ tinarka, salah yan inuha; anāvilaṁ, tar padoṣa; sarvaprapañcarahitaṁ; tan katəkan deniṅ sarvaprapañca, mvaṅ kleśopakleśa, nāṅ: mada, dambha, lobha, moha, rajah, tamah, tan tama ikā kabeh ri sira, tuhu karikā tan >pakāvak iṅpakavakaṅ maṅkana tahāvih, prapañcebhiḥ prapañcitaṁ, āpan ikaṅ rāga-dveṣa-moha, prapañca pinakāvaknira.

lg.l: karmakriyāvirahitaṁ satyadvayam anāśrayaṁ
idam yānavaraṁ śreṣṭhaṁ labhiṣyathaabhyasyata naye sthitāḥ ||9||

div.p:
ka: tan gave tan si magavaitan si magavai, tan si magavai pinakāvakniraKats detected the dittography but analyzed tan sima gavai.. satyadvayaṁ: tamolah makarūpa ikaṅ satyadvaya, ṅa, saṁvr̥ttisatya, paramārthasatya, anuṅ pinakarūpanira.
anāśrayaṁ: tan pāndəlan tan samvr̥ttisatya tan paramārthasatya kahananira, idaṁ yānavaraṁ śreṣṭhaṁ, yekā sinaṅguh mahāyāna mahāmārga ṅa, manəkakən irikaṅ svargāpavarga. abhyasyata naye sthitāḥ, ya tikābhyasanta sārisāri məneṅ hələm saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya mahāyāna.

quote.ab: oṁ! vajrodaka oṁ aḥ huṁ! iki śapathahr̥daya.

lg.l: idaṁ te nārakaṁnarakaṁ vāri samayātikramād dahetsamayātikrama uhetsamayātikramo vahet
samayarakṣaṇāt siddhyaisiddhye siddhaṁ vajrāmr̥todakaṁ ||10||

div.p:
ka: vehana kita manahapamanah apa vajrodaka. ikaṅ vajrodaka tan vvay samānya, vvai sakeṅ naraka ikā; samayātikramo vahet, mārganiṅ duhkha kapaṅguha, bhraṣṭa
sakulagotrabāndhava, ya tat pituhva samaya. kālanyat varavīryabaryya-baryyabhārya-bhārya rikeṅ saṅ hyaṅ vajrajñāna, samayarakṣaṇāt siddhye, kunaṅ ri səḍaṅnyat prayatna, tan paṅraparapā riṅ samaya, mārganiṅ hayu kasiddhyan kapaṅguha denta siddhaṁ bajrāmr̥todakaṁ, saṅkṣepanya: viṣāmr̥ta ikeṅ vajrodaka, vvah sahiṅga tinaṅkəptinika, pilih sukha pilih duhkha kapaṅguha. yat pramāda kita pamaṅguh duhkha, kunaṅ yat prayatna, avās ikaṅ sukha hayu kasiddhyan kapaṅguha usən, ṅūniveh dlāha.

lg.l: vajraṁ ghaṇṭāṁ ca mudrāṁ ca yady amaṇḍalinoAdyamaṇdha:linotan nāmaṇḍalinonādyāmaṇḍalinona hy amaṇḍalino vadet
hased vāśraddhadānevavāśr̥ddhavānenavāśraddhavān ena janaḥ saṁgaṇikāsthitaḥ ||11||

div.p:
ka: hayva kita umaramarahakən ika saṅ hyaṅ vajra ghaṇṭā mudrā riṅ vvaṅ adr̥ṣṭamaṇḍala, tapvan sāmayika rahasyan kubdan atah si
ra, tan avaravīryākna irikaṅ vvaṅ tapvan kr̥topadeśa, hased vāśraddhavān eva, athavi guyu-guyun taguyuguyunta kunaṅ si tan pituhun arthanira, tan āmbəkta təmən tumarima brata bhaṭāra, hayva ta maṅkana, yāvat taṅya:vataṁ vvaṅ apahasa ri saṅ hyaṅ mārga, janaḥ saṅganikāsthitaḥ, avās ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, kasaṅsāra sadākāla, mataṅnyan hayva tan tulus adhimukti rike saṅ hyaṅ vajrajñāna, kayatnaknātah saṅ hyaṅ samaya.

lg.l: ayaṁ te samayo vajrivajrī vajrasattva iti smr̥taḥ
āveśaya tuāveśayatu tenaiva vajrajñānam anuttaram ||12||

div.p:
ka: saṅ hyaṅ samaya ta sira sinaṅguh bhaṭāra vajrasattva; āveśayatu tenaiva bajrajñānam anuttaraṁ, sira teki pinakahr̥dayanta maṅke, vajrajñāna ikuṅ pinaka
hr̥dayanta, pahenak tāmbəkta.

lg.l: oṁ vajrasattvaḥ svayaṁ te 'dya cakṣūdghāṭanatatparaḥ
udghāṭayati sarvākṣo vajracakṣur anuttaram ||13||

div.p: ka: bhaṭāra śrī vajrasattva muvah hana ri matanta maṅke, cakṣūdghāṭanatatparaḥ, denira dumliṅakna panonta, mataṅnya pahabuṅah tāmbəkta, udghāṭayati sarvākṣo bajracakṣur anuttaraṁ, dəliṅakanta matanta, pahavās ta panonta ri saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala.

lg.l: idaṁ ca maṇḍalam paśya śraddhāñ janaya cādunāthādhunā
kule jāto 'si buddhānāṁ sarvamantrair adhiṣṭhitaḥ ||14||

div.p:
ka: vulat i saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala, śraddhāñ janayathādhunā, gavayakən taṅ śr̥ddha, hayva tan sagorava ri saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala, kule jāto 'si buddhānāṁ, apan kita
buddhakula maṅke, apan bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha ṅaranta məne, sarvamantrair adhiṣṭhitaḥ, tuvi sampun kr̥tādhiṣṭhāna iki de saṅ sarvatathāgata, inajyan sinaṅaskāra rikaṅ sarvamantra.

lg.l: sampado 'bhimukhāḥ sarvāḥ siddhayo gatayaś ca te
pālaya samayaṁ siddhyai mantreṣūdyogavān bhava ||15||

div.p: ka: aparək tekaṅ hayu ri kita, siddhayo gatayaś ca te, samaṅkana ikaṅ kasiddhyan abhimukha ikā kabeh, agya kapaṅguha denta; pālaya samayaṁ siddhye, ləkas ta umabhyāsa saṅ hyaṅ samaya, marapvan katəmu ikaṅ kasiddhyan usən denta; mantreṣūdyogavān bhava, gavayakan taṅ utsāha ri mantra japa pūjā usən, hayva hələmhələm, yathānyan kopalambha ikaṅ kasugatin irikeṅ ihajanma ṅūniveh dlāha.

quote.ab: iṁ oṁ vajranetrāpahara hara paṭalaṁ hriḥvajrasatvāya harahara paṭalīṁ hriḥvajranetrāya, harahara paṭalaṁ hr̥di

lg.l: ajñānapaṭalaṁ vatsa apanītaṁ jinaispunitaṁ jinanespunaṁ hi jinais tava
śalākair vaidyarājendraiḥsala:kair vyedyarājendraiḥEmend śalākivaidyarājendraiḥ? yathā lokasya taimiraṁ ||16||

div.p:
kaliṅanya: pahenak tāmbəkta, huvus hilaṅ ikaṅ ajñānapaṭala ri hatinta, binabadan de bhaṭāra śrī vajradhara śalākair vaidyarājendraiḥ yathālokasya taimiraṁ, kady aṅgānnikanaṅaṅganikanaṁaṅgānnikanaṅ vvaṅ lara matan putikən, ramun matanya tinamvan ta ya de saṅ vedya cinələkan matanya, varas tekā matanya həniṅ, menak panonya vəkasan ri hilaṅnikaṅ kavakamalādyupadravanya, maṅkana tekiṅ ajñānapaṭalanta an hilaṅtilaṁ tutas, tan paśeṣa sampun bina
badan de bhaṭāra, mataṅyar pahenak ta aṅənaṅənta, hayva saṅśaya.

lg.l: pratibimbasamā dharmā acchāḥ śuddhā hy anāvilāḥ
agrāhyānabhilāpyāś caagrāhyā abhilapyāś śa hetukarmasamudbhavāḥ ||17||

div.p: ka: pahavās denta umulati ikaṅ sarvadharma, tan hana pahinya lāvan māyā riṅ darpaṇa ry avakta vās ākārarūpanikanaṅ māyā riṅ darpaṇa, ndatan kavənaṅ ginaməl, apan tan hana tattvanya; maṅkana tekiṅ sarvabhāva, ṅūniveh janmamānuṣa hetukakarma dumadyakən ike, mataṅnya kadi katon mātramātra, kintu tan hana təməntəmən.

lg.l: evaṁ jñātvā imān dharmān nissvabhāvān anāvilānsvanāvilān
kuru sattvārtham atulaṁ jāto 'sy urasaaurasa tāyinām ||18||

div.p:
ka: pahavās ta denta guməgə̄ māyopamani sarva
dharma; nissvabhāvān nānāvilān, hayva ta puṅguṅ an nissvabhāva ikiṅ sarvabhāva; kuru satvārtham atulaṁ, gavayakan taṅ kaparārthan usən, jāto aurasa tāyināṁ, apan kita maṅke jinorasa ṅaranta: anak bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha, mataṅnyan hayva ta tan sārāmbək atasarambhakāta riṅ kuśalakarma, mvaṅ aṅiṅkiṅ parārtha.

lg.l: vajrasattvaḥ prakr̥tyaiva acchaśuddhaaccāśuddhaḥ anāvilaḥ
hr̥di tiṣṭhati te vatsa sarvabuddhādhipaḥ svayam ||19||

div.p:
ka: pahenak tāṅənaṅənta, bhaṭāra vajrasattva miṅasthūla sira ri hatinta, bhaṭāra vajrasattva ṅaranniraṅarannira; accāśuddha hy anāvilaḥ, śuddhasvabhāva sira, tan hana rāga, dveṣa, moha ri sira, tuvi ta pinakapradhāna saṅ sarvatathāgata sira, pinakahatinta sira maṅke, mārganiṅ puṇya
jñānasambhāra kapaṅguha denta donira hana, hayva ta sandeha.

lg.l: adyaprabhr̥ti lokasya cakraṁ vartaya tāyināṁ
sarvatra pūrya vimalaṁ dharmaśaṅkham anuttaram ||20||

div.p: ka: məne tamvayanta cakraṁ vartaya tāyināṁ, umindərakan dharmacakra bhaṭāra śrī vajradhara rikaṅ sarvasattva; sarvatra pūrya vimalaṁ dharmaśaṅkham anuttaraṁ, kunaṅ deyanta hibəki lyābi pənuhi teki daśadig anantaparyyanta sakalalokadhātu, kapva hibəkanantahibəkan an ta dharmaśaṅkha ikā kabeh.

lg.l: na te 'tra vimatiḥ kāryā nirviśaṅkena cetasā
prakāśaya mahātulaṁSpeijer notes that the reading mahātulaṁ is unmetrical. mantracaryānayammantracāryyanayammantrācāryanayam param ||21||

div.p:
ka: hayva kita vicikitsa, nirviśaṅkena cetasā, ikaṅ nissandeha atah ambəkakantaambəkakantaKats suggests ambəkanta but that does not seem right. Perhaps emend ambǝkananta?, prakāśaya mahātulaṁ
mantracāryanayam paraṁ, at pintonakna ike, saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya mahāyāna.

lg.l: evaṁ kr̥tajño buddhānāṁ upakārīti gīyate
te ca vajradharāḥ sarve rakṣanti tava sarvaśaḥ ||22||

div.p:
ka: apan ikaṅ vvaṅ kadi kita huvus kr̥tasaṅskāra ri bhaṭāra, gumave pūjā viśeṣa ri bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha, upakārīti gīyate, ya ikā sinaṅgah sampun maveh upakāra riupakāri, bhaṭāra ṅaran ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, te ca vajradharāḥ sarve rakṣanti tava sarvaśaḥ, kopakāran pva sira denta, rəṇa tāmbəknira, ya ta mataṅnya yatna rumakṣa kita ri rahina vəṅi, sakvanta saparanta sagaventa, at kita kinayatnakən denira ri vruhnira an sampun kopakāran
denta, ya mataṅnya hayva vicikitsavivikitsa, apan hana bhaṭāra śrī vajrasattva pinakātmarakṣantapinaka atmarakṣanta sira.

lg.l: nāsti kiñcid akartavyaṁ prajñopāyena cetasā
nirviśaṅkaḥ sadā bhūtvā prabhuṅkṣva kāmapañcakam ||23||

div.p:
ka: nora gavai anuṅ tan kavənaṅa gavayantatan ta kavənaṅa gavayan, ta yadyapin tribhuvanaduṣkara lviraniṅ karma, tan kavənaṅa ginave de saṅ hana riṅ svarga, manuṣya, pātāla, ikān maṅkana atiduṣkaranikaṅ karma kavənaṅ ikā yai tayaWulff gives as alternative emendation ikā ta ya ginave denta; prajñopāyena cetasā, ndan ikaṅ prajñā atah ambəkakənantaambəkakənanta, nirviśaṅkaḥ sadā bhūtvā, lāvan tan kahilaṅana atah kita irika nissandehacitta sadākāla; prabhuṅkṣva kāmapañcakam, paribhogan taṅ pañca kāmaguṇa denta, salvirniṅ kavi
ṣayankavi
ṣaya hayva pinilihan paribhogan kabeh denta, āpan donnidonikadi kita sādhaka, ndan hayvatah tan pakāmbək ika nissaṅśaya.

lg.l: yathā hi vinayaṁ pāntiyānti bodhisattvāś svabhāvataḥca bhāvataḥ
tathā hi sarvasattvārthaṁ kuryād rāgādibhiśrāgādhibhiś śuciḥ ||24||

div.p: ka: kady aṅgān bhaṭāra sikasa bodhisattvaboddhisatva mahāsattvā hanāmbəkAnn a:mbǝkannāmbək təmən sira guməgə̄ i saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya. ambək təmən ṅaranya: kumiṅkiṅa kaparārthān, tan kalepanāna deniṅ kleśa, tan kapalitanakapalitāna deniṅ rāga dveṣa moha.

lg.l: ye cānye samayadviṣṭāḥ samayabhraṣṭāsamaybhraṣṭāḥ ye janāḥ
māraṇīyāḥ prayatnena buddhaśāsanapālanebuddhāśāsanapālane ||25||

div.p:
ka: hana vvaṅ dveṣa ri saṅ hyaṅhya samaya, melik ri
saṅ hyaṅ mantranayamantrānaya; samayabhraṣṭāḥ ye janāḥ, hana vvaṅ samayabhraṣṭāḥ vih sampun kr̥tasamaya, manaḍah upadeśa, apa kunaṅ vaivartikavaivatikavivartika ta ya vəkasan? kinasampayannyakinasampayanya ta saṅ guru, inumpətnya sira. māraṇīyāḥ prayatnena, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana nāṅ samayadviṣṭa mvaṅ samayabhraṣṭa kinonakən ikā pəjahana, tan patə̄gvakna de bhaṭāra, buddhaśāsanapālane, yatanyan karakṣā śāsana bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha, lāvan katvaṅana saṅ hyaṅ samaya, maṅkana phalanyan patyana ikaṅ samayavidveṣādi.

lg.l: dr̥ṣṭaṁ praviṣṭaṁ paramaṁ rahasyottamamaṇḍalaṁrahasyātkhamamaṇḍalaṁ
sarvapāpair vinirmuktāvinirmuktaḥ bhavanto 'dyaiva susthitāḥśuddhitāḥsodhitāḥ ||26||

div.p:
ka: pakenak tāmbəkta harah, sampun praviṣṭamaṇḍala
ṅaranta maṅke, tumama ri saṅ hyaṅ paramarahasya. kunaṅ deyanta pahavās vulatta rike saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala, sarvapāpair vinirmuktaḥ, kita pva sampun tumama ri maṇḍala, vinarah ri lavālavanikaṅlavalava nikaṅ rahasya, mataṅnya hilaṅa sakvehni pāpanta, alilaṅa kadi vinasəhan, hilaṅ samūlonmūlitasamūlonmūlati, bhavanto 'dyeva śuddhitaḥ. pahenak tāmbəkta, hayva saṅśaya.

lg.l: na bhūyo ramaṇam bhotibhosti yānād asmānasmāt mahāsukhāt
adhr̥ṣyāśavr̥ṣyāś cāpy avadhyāścānavadyāścāpy avandyāś ca ramadhvam akutobhayāḥ ||27||

div.p:
ka: kita tan vaivartikākita vivartikakita vaivatikaAnother possibility would be to understand kitāvaivartika., yānād asmāt mahāsukhāt, saṅka rikeṅ mantranaya, hila-hila vvaṅ kadi kita vaivartikavaivatikavivartika ri saṅ hyaṅ mārga, avr̥ṣyāś cāpy avandyāś ca, kunaṅ
ri səḍaṅnyat prayatna umabhyāsa saṅ hyaṅ mantra avās ikaṅ hayu kasiddhyan kapaṅguha denta, tan kavənaṅ inulahulah deniṅ māra tīrthikāditirvikādi; ramadhvam akutobhayāḥ, mataṅnya pahenak tāmbəkta, hayva sigasigun, tulusakən pratipattinteritulusakən pratipattinta, ri saṅ hyaṅ mantra.

lg.l: ayaṁ vaḥ satataṁ rakṣyaḥ siddhasamayasaṁvaraḥsiddhasamayaśambaraḥ
sarvabuddhasamaṁ proktaḥsarvabuddhasamāḥ proktāḥsarvabuddhaiḥ samaṁ proktaḥ ājñā paramaśāśvatīajñāpāramaṁśāśvatīājñāṁ pāraya śāśvatīṁ ||28||

div.p:
ka: prayatna tah kita rumakṣa saṅ hyaṅ samaya, hayva tan eṅət itannaṁti kuṇḍaṅ rahasyanatah sira denta, vruha ta kita rikaṅ yogya varahən ri saṅ hyaṅ samaya, hayva ta deny adhikadinadhi kavvaṅanya, āmbəknya, ulahnya, maryādanya, kunaṅ pva yan tuhutuhu śr̥ddhānya, acchedyābhedya ri saṅ hyaṅ mantra, irikā ta kitad varaha yakita dvarahaya ri saṅ hyaṅ
rahasya; hayva saṅśaya, hayva kundulkundul umarahakən ri saṅ hyaṅ samaya rikāṅ adhimuktikasattva, sarvabuddhasamaṁ proktaḥ, āpan sampun kita kr̥tānujñāta de saṅ sarvatathāgata, inanumoda de bhaṭāra umintonakna saṅ hyaṅ samaya, ājñāṁ pāraya śāśvatīṁ, kita iko katibān anujñātatatibānyanujñāta bhaṭāra, sumiddhākna sapakon saṅ sarvatathāgata.

lg.l: bodhicittaṁ tavātyājyaṁtvayātyājyaṁde Jong comments that Wulff's silent emendation is unnecessary yad vajram iti mudrayā
yasyotpādaikamātreṇa buddha eva na saṁśayaḥ ||29||

div.p:
ka: saṅ hyaṅ bodhicitta tan tiṅgalakna denta; bodhicitta ṅa: yad bajram iti mudrayā, saṅ hyaṅ vajra sira bodhicitta ṅaranira lāvan saṅ hyaṅ mudrā, yasyotpādaikamātreṇa, denikā kāraṇan saṅ hyaṅ vajra lāvan
mudrā, buddha eva na saṅśayaḥ, hyaṅ buddha kita dlāha, kasākṣātkr̥ta ikaṅ kaləpasən denta, ri səḍaṅnyat prayatna ri saṅ hyaṅ vajra ghaṇṭā mvaṅ mudrā.

lg.l: saddharmo na pratikṣepyaḥ na tyājyaś ca kadācana
ajñānād atha mohād vā na vai vivr̥ṇuyāt sa tuvivr̥ṇuyās tataḥdespite De Jong's suggestion that vivarṇayet is better here, GuSaMaVi 383 has the same reading here ||30||

div.p: ka: tan tulaka saṅ hyaṅ saddharma, na tyājyaś ca kadācana, lāvan tan tiṅgalakna sira, ajñānād atha mohād vā na vai vivr̥ṇuyās tataḥ, tan dadi vvaṅ kadi kita umivāraṇe saṅ hyaṅ saddharma, saṅka riṅ ajñāna lāvan kamohan, mataṅnyan hayva maṅkana, laraṅan ikaṅ vvaṅ mantranaya mahāyānānuyāyīmahāyānānuyi, umivāraṇa saṅ hyaṅ sūtrānta.

lg.l: svam ātmānam parityajya tapobhir na ca pīḍayetḥnaḥtha pīḍayetnātipīḍayetnātipīḍayetEmended after GuSaMaVi 384, etc.
yathāsukhaṁ sukhaṁ dhāryaṁ sambuddho 'yamsambuddheyam anāgataḥ ||31||

div.p:
ka: pa
ṭavarikāvaktapa
tivarika:vakta:prativārikāvakta, svakāyanirapekṣataḥ kita, hayva tr̥ṣṇa riṅ avak, tapobhir nātipīḍayet, hayva pinisakitanpinrisakitan riṅ tapa, hayva vineh gumavayakan kavənaṅnya, yathāsukhaṁ sukhan dhāryyaṁ, yathāsukhātahyathāsukātahyathāsukatāh lvirantat gavayaknaṅ bodhimārga, sambuddho 'yam anāgataḥ, hayva gyā hyaṅ buddha kita dlāha.

lg.l: vajraṁ ghaṇṭāṁ ca mudrāṁ ca na saṁtyajya kadācana
ācāryo nāvamantavyaḥ sarvabuddhasamo hy asau ||32||

div.p:
ka: saṅ hyaṅ vajra, ghaṇṭā mvaṅ mudrā hayva kari sira denta, sakvanta, saparanta, kuṇḍaṅanta sira, ĀCĀRYO NĀVAMANTAVYAḤ, lāvan ta veh tan gavayaknaṅ gurudrohaka, tan vənaṅ ikā vvaṅ avamāna ri ḍaṅ ācārya, mataṅnyan tan kāvamānana sira denta, sarvabuddha
samo hy asau, sarvabuddhasama sira, paḍa lāvan bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha kabeh.

lg.l: yaś cāvamanyed ācāryaṁ sarvabuddhasamaṁ guruṁ
sarvabuddhāvamānena nityaṁ duḥkham avāpnuyāt ||33||

div.p: ka: apan ikaṅ vvaṅ avajñā, avamāna, masampe guru, sa nityan duḥkham avāpnuyātapnuyāt, ya ikā mulih riṅ naraka, tibā riṅ kavah saṅ yama, pinakahitipniṅ tāmragomukha; maṅkana pāpaniṅ vvaṅ avamāna maguru.

lg.l: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena vajrācāryyam mahāguruṁ
pracchannavarakalyāṇaṁ, nāvamanyet kadācana ||34||

div.p:
ka: hayva tan prayatna maguru, yadyapi, pracchannavarakalyāṇa, ika gurunta tan katona hayunira guṇanira denta, ikan samaṅkana, nāvamanyet kadācana,
tan avamāna ta kita ri sira, āpan mahāpāpa mahāduhkha ikaṅ tan atvaṅ maguru, mataṅnya varaprayatnavvara prayatna tah ri kavyāpāraOJED suggests kavyāpāran. saṅ guru.

lg.l: nityaṁ svasamayaḥ sādhyo nityaṁ pūjyās tathāgatāḥpūjyas tathāgataḥsee i.a. GuSaMaVi 390
nityaṁ ca gurave deyaṁguruvedeyaṁguruvaiddheyyaṁcf. de Jong, GuSaMaVi 390 sarvabuddhasamo hy asau ||35||

div.p: ka: hayva kaluban kita gumavayakna saṅ hyaṅ samaya, nityaṁ pūjyas tathāgataḥ, lāvan śāśvata kita gumavayaknaṅ tathāgatapūjā, nityañ ca guruvaidheyaṁ, nityaśanityasa kita gumavayakən guruśuśrūṣā, umyāpāra saṅ guru, sarvabuddhasamo hy asau, apayapanapa yāpan sarvatathāgatasama saṅ guru ṅaranira, mataṅyan sira pagavayaknanta kaśuśrūṣākaśuśruṣāWulff suggests the emendation kaśuśrūṣān.

lg.l: datte 'sminEmend 'smai? Cf. GuSaMaVi 391. sarvabuddhebhyo dattam bhavati cākṣayam
taddānāt puṇyasambhāraḥ sambhārāt siddhir uttamā ||36||

div.p: ka: apan ikaṅ vvaṅ kadi kita gumavayakən ikaṅ guruśuśrūṣā, maveh upahārādi ri ḍaṅ guru, yeka paṅipuk dānasambhāra ri bhaṭāra hyaṅ buddha ṅaranya, taddānāt puṇyasambhāraḥ, ya sambhandhanyan katəmu ikaṅ puṇyasambhāra, sambhārāt siddhir uttamā, ri kapaṅguhan ikaṅ puṇyasambhāra, ya dumeh rikaṅ kasiddhyan sulabha ri kita, ri prayatnanta rika guruśuśrūṣā.

lg.l: nityaṁ svasamayācāryaṁ prāṇair api nijair bhajet
adeyaiḥ putradārair vā kim punar vibhavaiś calaiḥ ||37||

div.p:
ka: hurip tuvi tinarimakan ri ḍaṅ guru, gumavaya kabyāpāranira donya, adeyaiḥ putradārair vā, āstām ikaṅ anak rabi inarpaṇākən ikā kabeh i bharāla guru, dāsa
bhūtā, hulunanira umyāpāra ri sira pakənanya, kim punar vibhavaiś calaiḥ, hayva ta vinuvus ikaṅ dr̥vya ṅaranya, kadyāṅganiṅ mās maṇik dodot pirak pinūjākən ikā kabeh i ḍaṅ guru.

lg.l: yasmāt sudurlabhaṁ nityaṁ kalpāsaṁkhyeyakoṭibhiḥ
buddhatvam udyogavate dadātīhaiva janmani ||38||

div.p:
ka: apanapann ikaṅ kahyaṅ-buddhan atyanta paramadurlabha kətekā, yadyapin kalpāsaṅkhyeyakoṭijanma, lāvasaniṅ vvaṅ gumavayaknaṅ kuśalamūla dānapāramitādi sumādhyaṅ kahyaṅbuddhan, ikān maṅkana tan niyata kapaṅguha, saṅka ri durlabhanikaṅ kaləpasan ṅaranya,
buddhatvam udyogavate dadātīhaiva janmani, ikaṅ kahyaṅ-buddhan yateka vinehakan de bharāla guru irikeṅ janmanta maṅke, ṅhiṅ hīṅanan i gə̄ṅny anugrahanireanugrahanira kita, mataṅnya tan halaṅ tan luṇḍu tan vəlaṅ vəlutən aṅən-aṅəntaaṅīn-aṅantaaṅə̄n-aṅantaSee , s.vv. alaṅ/malaṅ, luṇḍu and especially vəlaṅ vəlutən. an pūjākən huripta mvaṅ anak rabinta ri ḍaṅ guru.

lg.l: adya vaḥ saphalaṁ janma yad asmin supratiṣṭhitāḥsupratiṣṭhitaḥCf. GuSaMaVi 392.
samāḥ samayadevānāmsamaḥ samāyadevānāmsamasamā ye devānāmsamāḥ samā hi devānāmCf. GuSaMaVi 392. adya jātāḥ svayambhuvaḥsvayambhavaḥ ||39||

div.p: adya vaḥ saphalañ janma yad asmin supratiṣṭhitaḥ, an pakaśaraṇa saṅ hyaṅ samaya, samāḥ samā hi devānām adya jātāḥ svayaṁbhavaḥ: āpan avak hyaṅ buddha kita maṅke usən, karatalavyavasthita, ikaṅ kahyaṅbuddhānkahyaṅbuddhātvanor emend kahyaṅbuddhatvan? ri kita, kāgəm kamuṣṭi ikaṅ kaləpasən denta.

lg.l: adyābhiṣiktāyuṣmantaḥ sarvabuddhaiḥ savajribhiḥ
traidhātukamahārājye rājādhipatayaḥ sthitāḥ ||40||

div.p: ka: pahenak tāmbəktatămbəktaMisprint., sampun kr̥tābhiṣeka kita de saṅsa sarvatathāgata lāvan saṅ sarvatathāgatī; ṅaran ikaṅ abhiṣeka tinarimanta: cakravartyabhiṣeka ṅaranya.

lg.l: adya mārānmāraṁ Kats vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṁ puraṁ
prāptam adyaiva buddhatvaṁ bhavadbhir nātra saṁśayaḥ ||41||

div.p: ka: avās alahnikaṅ mārakarma denta, praviṣṭāḥ paramam puraṁ, niyata ikā nirvāṇapura katəkan denta maṅke, prāptam adyaiva buddhatvaṁ, kapaṅguha niyatanikaṅ kamokṣan denta ri janmanta maṅke, bhavadbhir nātra saṅśayaḥ: pahenak tāṅənaṅənta, hayva saṅśaya.

lg.l: iti kuruta manaḥ prasādāvajraṁ svasamayamsvasamāyam akṣayasaukhyadam bhajadhvaṁ
jagati laghu sukhe 'dyalaghusukheti sarvabuddhapratisamaśāśvatatāṁsarvabuddhapratisamaśāśvatitāṁsarvabuddhapratisamāś śāśvatitāṅGuSaMaVi 395 vajrasattvapratisamaśāśvatatāṁ gatā bhavantaḥ.

div.p:
ka: mataṅnya tulusakənta śr̥ddhānta, pahapagəh ta manahta, makamārga saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya mahāyāna, svasamāyaṁ akṣayasaukhyadaṁ bhajadhvaṁ, atikāstaAt· Ika:staatikāṣṭa, s.v. atikaṣṭa, suggests emending at ləkas ta. rumakṣa saṅ hyaṅ samaya, āpan sira vənaṅ umehakan ikaṅ anuttarasukha, jagati laghusukheti sarvabuddhapratisamāś śāśvatitāṅ gatā bhavantaḥ, āpan ikeṅ janma manuṣya ṅaranya, akəḍik sukhanya; yathānyat paṅguhakna kahyaṅbuddhan, paḍā lāvan saṅ sarvatathāgata, mataṅnyan ləkasa umabhyāsaumabhyasa saṅ hyaṅ samaya, gumavayakna saṅ hyaṅ mantranaya mahāyāna, hayva ta pra
māda kita, kayatnakan təməntəmən, yathānyan sulabha ikaṅ kasiddhyan kapaṅguha denta.

div.ab: iti saṅ hyaṅ kamahāyānan mantranaya samāpta.
